document_data.name: Company of Crazed Venturers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of Crazed Venturers''' was one of [[Waterdeep]]'s most famous adventuring groups.{{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar}}
document_data.Exploits:
The Company of Crazed Venturers was involved in many activities in and around Waterdeep. Some of the more notable ones include:
* Driving the [[vampire]] [[Artor Morlin]] from his lair in the [[Dungeon of the Crypt]] beneath the [[City of the Dead (Waterdeep)|City of the Dead]].
* Destroying the [[beholder]] [[Xliilqil]] out of [[Fell Pass]].
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]]
* [[Loene]]
* [[Nain Keenwhistler]]
* [[Savengriff]]
* [[Tolgar Anuvien]] of [[Goldenfields]]
* [[Dumal Erard]] of [[Helm's Hold]]
* [[Malchor Harpell]] of the [[Tower of Twilight]]
* [[Trunnian Regalis]] of [[Evermeet]]

Though not a member, [[Quelzard]], a [[greater doppelganger]], "patronized" the Company throughout their career, arranging fortuitous events that ensured the party's survival so that Quelzard could continue to subtly profit from their adventures.{{Cite web/Forging the Realms/Quelzard, Patron of Adventurers}}
document_data.History: The Company of Crazed Venturers was present at the famed [[bard]] Mintiper's performance in [[Neverwinter]] sometime in the early-to-mid 14{{th}} century DR, during which he performed several songs, including ''[[Winterwillow]]'', ''[[Thorn of Rose]]'', ''[[Blood of My Sisters]]'', ''[[Stone Fall, Tree Rise]]'', ''[[Greenhallow Mantle]]'', ''[[Knights on the Ride]]'', ''[[Laeryn's Lament]]'', and ''[[My Love Green and Growing]]''.
